name: Survival Basics
description: Essential first-week survival skills covering water, fire, shelter, food, first-aid, and sanitation. Start here if you're new to survival preparation.

name: Food Production
description: Learn to grow, raise, hunt, harvest, and preserve food for long-term self-sufficiency. Covers agriculture, animal husbandry, foraging, and food preservation.

name: Medical & Health
description: Develop medical knowledge for diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of illness without modern healthcare systems. Includes first aid, herbalism, surgery, and pharmaceuticals.

name: Crafts & Manufacturing
description: Master practical crafts and manufacturing techniques for everyday items. Learn metalworking, textiles, pottery, leather, soap, and tool-making.

name: Technology Rebuild
description: Understand electricity, motors, steam engines, radio communications, and basic computing. Rebuild technological infrastructure from scratch.

name: Community Building
description: Establish functional communities with proper governance, economics, education, legal systems, and communication networks for long-term sustainability.

name: Advanced Sciences
description: Deep dive into chemistry, physics, mathematics, and advanced engineering. Develop theoretical understanding and practical applications for industry.

name: Self-Sufficiency
description: Curated beginner-to-advanced path through the most important guides for complete independence. A balanced journey from basic survival to advanced capabilities.
